properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 4:18AM CST until January 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of
around two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Marion and Chase Counties.

* WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM CST Saturday. Most of the
precipitation will occur this afternoon through about 4 AM
Saturday. Mainly light snow is expected during the day on
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
